mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gospel According to St. Mark
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the Gospel According to St. Mark: The King James Version. Presented by Rex Partington, Producing Director. Featuring Tom Stolz. Directed by Don Stolz. 1992 Guest Artist Series.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
